description: This file defines external API function prototypes for a Broker Socket TCP object, including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions. It is part of a network service container system, likely providing interfaces for TCP socket management within the ANSC framework.

methods.name: AnscCreateBrokerSocketTcp
methods.description: Creates a new Broker Socket TCP object with provided container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: AnscBktoCreate
methods.description: Constructs a Broker Socket TCP object instance with specified context and ownership handles.

methods.name: AnscBktoRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up a Broker Socket TCP object instance.

methods.name: AnscBktoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls or registers necessary sub-objects or components for the Broker Socket TCP object.

methods.name: AnscBktoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Broker Socket TCP object instance, preparing it for use.
